channel.title: Oflline client?
channel.description:
hey all, i dont know if thats called double post but i guess not anyway, so guys i tried everything to make my client online but nothing i downloaded no-ip and i made a host and i have a hamache everything i changed the ip in the client <<not sure about that because when i search in the client file for 127.0.0.1 it shows client.java which it have all files for the server or client anyway i press on it (client.java) i press search in the file and i type 127.0 nothing shows i type 127.0.0 nothing shows and 127.0.0.1 and..nothing shows but when i search in the server file or i dont know how to call it like the server folder so i search for 127.0.0 it shows client.java but when i pressed it and search for 127.. nothing shows and again and again and i dont know how to get to the "127.0.0.1" to change it for my host or somthing like that so my question is
(((how to make it onlline??)))
SORRY FOR BAD ENGLISH I WISH YOU COULD UNDERSTAND ME ...DONT FLAME :)
screens: [b]first no-ip and hamachi which all are true[/b]: [img]http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/9374/38253783.png[/img]
second: my problem! [img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/7307/22933920.png[/img]
please help me thanks

item.title: Oflline client?
item.dc:creator: @david2471 david2471
item.description:
@david2471 wrote:

You need to open client.java and search through it…
